title: halocraft mod 不让枪械破坏玻璃
author: fangchenxiao
txt_content:
halocraft不让枪械破坏玻璃,    B:"Enable Halocraft Explosion Block Damage"=false的方法已经试过了,但是只能取消爆炸破坏,照样破坏玻璃.
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-480349-1-1.html这个mod

replies.author: 静水先生
replies.txt_content: /teams canBreakGlass false 关闭枪械破坏玻璃和萤石15

replies.author: fangchenxiao
replies.txt_content:
